mapper.sql: task_id, version, mode_id, base_id, task_time_range, tutor_id, base_name, contact_name, contact_tel, address
mapper.select:
SELECT tc.*, tcd.week_day FROM t_task_config tc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT task_id, version, json_extract (config_detail, '$.signRate') AS week_day FROM t_task_config_detail WHERE plugin_key = 'SIGN' ) tcd ON tc.task_id = tcd.task_id AND tc.version = tcd.version
limit #{page.start},#{page.end}
mapper.insert: insert into t_task_config (task_id, version, mode_id, base_id, task_time_range, tutor_id, base_name, contact_name, contact_tel, address) values (#{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{version,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{taskTimeRange,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tutorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_task_config
task_id,
version,
mode_id,
base_id,
task_time_range,
tutor_id,
base_name,
contact_name,
contact_tel,
address,
#{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{version,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{baseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{taskTimeRange,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{tutorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{baseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_task_config
mode_id = #{modeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
base_id = #{baseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
task_time_range = #{taskTimeRange,jdbcType=CHAR},
tutor_id = #{tutorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
base_name = #{baseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_tel = #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update t_task_config set mode_id = #{modeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, base_id = #{baseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, task_time_range = #{taskTimeRange,jdbcType=CHAR}, tutor_id = #{tutorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, base_name = #{baseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_tel = #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
